Control Name: Establish an access control system for systems components that restricts access based on a user\u2019s need to know, and is set to \u201cdeny all\u201d unless specifically allowed.\nThis access control system must include the following:\nAssignment of privileges to individuals based on job classification and function.

control_attributes.Requirement: 7.2.2.Restrict access to cardholder data by business need to know
